Class oracle.html.CompoundItem 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index  OWS Table of Contents

Class oracle.html.CompoundItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.CompoundItem
public class CompoundItem
extends Item

Description:

CompoundItem is a type-safe container class for Items.
It allows the client to construct custom paraeterized classes for component based dynamic page construction.
Note this class differs from CompoundItem in that a CompoundItem is also an Item, whereas a Container isn't.

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to create custom container components that are themselves Items.

Example: 

// Create a new CompoundItem object
CompoundItem compoundItem = new CompoundItem();
// Set the default text attribute of all items in Compound Item
// Note that this operation cannot be done with a Container
compoundItem.setItal();
// Add a SimpleItem and a TextArea to the CompoundItem
compoundItem.addItem(new Simpleitem("How are you?").setBold())
            .addItem(new TextArea("response", 30, 10));
// Add the CompoundItem to the body object (assuming it's been created)
body.addItem(compoundItem);

See Also:
Item, Container

Creates a CompoundItem with the specified storage capacity

Creates an empty CompoundItem
